short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom keyboard shortcuts for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables several actions that help you control your browser, like rearranging, duplicating, or moving tabs between windows. All actions can be assigned custom keyboard shortcuts to provide a personalized and convenient way boost to your productivity. Actions can also be disabled or enabled individually to prevent unintentional behavior. As development continues, more actions will be made available.
